segments.text: Good morning.sir.My name is Liu Peng from Tsinghai University . I am here for the interview relating to my visa application .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Glad to meet you.Would you mind if I ask you some questions ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why do you want to go to the US ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd like to have further education.Now I am studying for my doctorate .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Will you get any kind of scholarship ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . The school has provided me with full scholarship and that will be enough to support myself .
segments.speaker: S1
